body.p:
Commonwealth of Kentucky,
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT,
Frankfort, Decr 9th 1863.

The Adjt. Genl. will give Capt D. C. Stone a recruiting Commission, to recruit a company of light Artillery Co D. 4. Battery light Artillery. Capt Stone was commissioned 2d Lt to recruit for 2nd Regt heavy artillery -- but prefers the other service, and 4th Battery has never been filled.

Tho E Bramlette
D. C. Stone com 2 Lieut 4 Batty 1 Artillery Regt Decr 9: 1863
1. 2. 3. 4. 5.

1 Art. Coy D.
Lt. D. C. Stone
Com issd & deld
Decr 9 1863
Co D -- 4th Arty
